text: Vaughen Isaacs (born ) is a South African rugby union player for the in the Currie Cup and the in the Rugby Challenge. His regular position is fly-half or fullback. He made his Currie Cup debut for the Blue Bulls in August 2019, coming on as a replacement fly-half in their final match of the 2019 season against the . ==Senior career== ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1999 births Category:Rugby union fly-halves Category:Rugby union fullbacks Category:Blue Bulls players Category:South Africa Under-20 international rugby union players
title: Vaughen Isaacs
